sk.tsystems.forum.entity

Class CommentRating

  • java.lang.Object
    • sk.tsystems.forum.entity.common.CommonEntity
      • sk.tsystems.forum.entity.CommentRating
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<CommentRating>

    @Entity
public class CommentRating
extends CommonEntity
implements java.lang.Comparable<CommentRating>
    Entity for CommentRating containing rating from User user to specified comment Comment, which is included in one of the themes Theme
    Author:
    J3DT
